content_html:
A pedestrian has died after being hit by a bus in the Balaju area of Kathmandu. The victim has been identified as Jas Bahadur Magar, a 68-year-old resident of Ward Number 7 in Khandbari Municipality, Sankhuwasabha.

Details of the Incident

Details of the Incident
title: Fatal Traffic Accident in Balaju
